title: ðŸš¨ JJ Watt released by the Texans - Emergency Podcast (Football 2/12)
description:
JJ Watt and the Texans have decided to mutually part ways after 10 seasons. Watt now hits the open market with plenty of potential suitors. On this emergency episode, Will Brinson and John Breech break down the future Hall of Famer's tenure in Houston and what could be next as he tries to add a ring to his resume. The Steelers are an obvious landing spot with both of his brothers already on the team, but a lot of other organizations would love to add Watt. And what does this mean for the trade timeline of Deshaun Watson? All that and more on this ðŸš¨Â episode.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis

On this emergency episode, Will Brinson and John Breech break down the future Hall of Famer's tenure in Houston and what could be next as he tries to add a ring to his resume. The Steelers are an obvious landing spot with both of his brothers already on the team, but a lot of other organizations would love to add Watt.
